modName: Expanded Towns and Cities Automatic Timed Exterior Lights
summary: This mod puts all of ETaCs exterior lights onto a timer, and they switch on and off automatically.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84868/84868-1519769005-170288287.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3712477/?][/url][img]http://i.imgur.com/WH0Gmkq.jpg[/img]

[size=6]Expanded Towns and Cities Automatic Timed Exterior Lights
[/size][/center][center][size=4]
This mod puts all of ETaC's exterior lights onto a timer. Now they switch on and off automatically.[/size][/center]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Installation[/size][/color]
Download with a mod manager and install as normal or place the files in your Data folder. The light script should not be overwritten.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Requirements[/size][/color]
Expanded Towns and Cities Complete v14+

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Post Installation[/size][/color]
Once in game you need to wait 24hrs to let the timer script begin working.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Un-installation[/size][/color]
This mod contains a single script. You should not un-install scripted-mods mid game. If you do, clean your save with save tool.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Compatibility[/size][/color]
This is for [u]ETaC Complete v14[/u] and upwards. It is not backwards compatible with earlier versions of ETaC. 

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Functionality[/size][/color]
The toggle brightness activators by the door and in the MCM have no effect with this mod installed.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Switching on/off times [/size][/color]
The lights come on at 6 p.m. and switch off at 7 a.m.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Bulb brightness levels[/size][/color]
There are 2 brightness versions available. "Less bright" which is suitable for thief's, murderers and shady bastards.  There is also a 'more bright' version which I prefer and is recommended for most playthroughs.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Versions[/size][/color]
The file section includes individual versions for ETaC complete, it's add-ons and there are merged versions as well.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Cleanliness[/size][/color]
These files have been cleaned in TES5EDIT.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Future plans[/size][/color]
Amend the light script so it runs after fast travel. The source code is included if anyone wishes to assist.



[center][color=#ffff00][size=4][u]Frequently Asked Questions[/u][/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]It's night-time and none of the bulbs are on?[/size][/color]
Sometimes when you fast travel, the script doesn't update correctly. To fix it, wait in game until the next switching on time or for 24 hrs. Alternatively you can take advantage of the temporary darkness and commit atrocities.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]It's daytime and the bulbs are still on?[/size][/color]
Sometimes when you fast travel, the script doesn't update correctly. To fix it, wait in game until the next switching off time or for 24 hrs.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Will you make a modular version?[/size][/color]
I do not want to make any promises I can't keep so I will not be making a modular version.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Do I need to start a new game?[/size][/color]
No.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Any more comics?[/size][/color]
More available in my other mods
[color=#ffff00]

[size=4][center]Permissions and Credits[/center][/size][/color]

[center]You are not permitted to share, re-upload, charge or use this mod in your own work without my permission.

Credits to Cipscis for the script and Miss Jenna Bee, author of Expanded Towns and Cities for allowing me to upload this work[/center]
